languages.text: Если персонаж является {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}ассасином культа смерти{/g}, когда он убивает врага, из того вырывается струя крови, заливая ближайшие клетки, как при использовании {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}кровавого фиала{/g}.
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, whenever the wearer kills an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Если персонаж является ассасином культа смерти, когда он убивает врага, из того вырывается струя крови, заливая ближайшие клетки, как при использовании {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}кровавого фиала{/g}.

Если персонаж является ассасином культа смерти, когда он убивает врага, из того вырывается струя крови, заливая ближайшие клетки, как при использовании {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}кровавого фиала{/g}.

languages.text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, whenever the wearer kills an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If the wearer is the Death Cult assassin, whenever they kill an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Blood Phial{/g}.
If the wearer is the Death Cult assassin, whenever they kill an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by blood phial.
If the wearer is the Death Cult assassin, whenever they kill an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by blood phial.

If worn by a Death Cult assassin, whenever the wearer kills an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}.

If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, whenever the wearer kills an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}.

If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, whenever the wearer kills an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}.

languages.text: Si un {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}asesino del Culto de la Muerte{/g} lleva esto, cuando mata a un enemigo hace que explote en una lluvia de sangre. Las casillas cercanas quedan cubiertas de sangre como si se hubiera usado un {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}frasco de sangre{/g}.
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, whenever the wearer kills an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Si un asesino del Culto de la Muerte lleva esto, cuando mata a un enemigo hace que explote en una lluvia de sangre. Las casillas cercanas quedan cubiertas de sangre como si se hubiera usado un {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}frasco de sangre{/g}.

languages.text: {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}デスカルト・アサシン{/g}が装備した場合、使用者が敵を倒すたび、その敵は爆発して血の噴水になる。近隣のセルは、{g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}血の小瓶{/g}の影響を受けたかのように血で覆われる。
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, whenever the wearer kills an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}.

traits.locale_text: デスカルト・アサシンが装備した場合、使用者が敵を倒すたび、その敵は爆発して血の噴水になる。近隣のセルは、{g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}血の小瓶{/g}の影響を受けたかのように血で覆われる。

languages.text: 当这件装备被{g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}拜死教刺客{/g}装备时，每当装备者杀死敌人时，敌人都会鲜血四溅，使周围所有格子被鲜血覆盖，效果等同于{g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}鲜血安瓿{/g}。
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, whenever the wearer kills an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当这件装备被拜死教刺客装备时，每当装备者杀死敌人时，敌人都会鲜血四溅，使周围所有格子被鲜血覆盖，效果等同于{g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}鲜血安瓿{/g}。

languages.text: ({g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Assassin du culte de la mort{/g}) Chaque ennemi tué par le porteur explose et recouvre les cases proches de sang comme si elles étaient affectées par {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Fiole de sang{/g}.
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, whenever the wearer kills an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}.

traits.locale_text: (Assassin du culte de la mort) Chaque ennemi tué par le porteur explose et recouvre les cases proches de sang comme si elles étaient affectées par {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Fiole de sang{/g}.

languages.text: Werden sie von einem {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Todeskult-Assassinen{/g} getragen, explodiert ein vom Träger getöteter Gegner in einer Blutfontäne. Angrenzende Zellen werden wie durch {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Blutphiole{/g} mit Blut bedeckt.
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, whenever the wearer kills an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Werden sie von einem Todeskult-Assassinen getragen, explodiert ein vom Träger getöteter Gegner in einer Blutfontäne. Angrenzende Zellen werden wie durch {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}Blutphiole{/g} mit Blut bedeckt.

languages.text: Bir {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Ölüm Tarikatı suikastçısı{/g} tarafından giyiliyorsa giyen kişi bir düşmanı öldürdüğünde o düşman patlar ve kan âdeta fışkırarak etrafa saçılır. Yakındaki hücreler, {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}kan tüpünden{/g} etkilenmiş gibi kanla kaplanır.
languages.original_text: If worn by a {g|f:9b090810169e4a42b22afd5995d3720d}Death Cult assassin{/g}, whenever the wearer kills an enemy, that enemy explodes in a fountain of blood. The cells nearby are covered in blood as if affected by {g|f:3a4eebf212974ba68d6867981c240b1b}blood phial{/g}.
